trans-unit.source: Passed to custom WSDL exporters and importers to enable customization of the metadata export and import processes for a WSDL endpoint.

The <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.WsdlEndpointConversionContext> class represents the context in which the custom WSDL for an endpoint is either exported using <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.IWsdlExportExtension?displayProperty=fullName> or imported using <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.IWsdlImportExtension?displayProperty=fullName>.
The following properties enable you to retrieve the WSDL document object model for the current WSDL:

The <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.WsdlEndpointConversionContext.ContractConversionContext%2A> property gets the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.WsdlContractConversionContext?displayProperty=fullName> for the endpoint contract.

The <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.WsdlEndpointConversionContext.Endpoint%2A> property gets the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.ServiceEndpoint?displayProperty=fullName> for the current endpoint.
The <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.WsdlEndpointConversionContext.WsdlBinding%2A> property gets the binding for the current endpoint.
The <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.WsdlEndpointConversionContext.WsdlPort%2A> property gets the port for the current endpoint.
The following methods enable you to add or remove custom WSDL elements to the appropriate scopes in the exported or imported WSDL:
The <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.WsdlEndpointConversionContext.GetFaultBinding%2A> method returns the fault binding for the specified fault.
The <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.WsdlEndpointConversionContext.GetFaultDescription%2A> method returns the fault for the specified fault binding.
The <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.WsdlEndpointConversionContext.GetMessageBinding%2A> method returns the message binding for the specified message.
The <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.WsdlEndpointConversionContext.GetMessageDescription%2A> method returns the message for the specified message binding.
The <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.WsdlEndpointConversionContext.GetOperationBinding%2A> method returns the operation binding for the specified operation.
The <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.WsdlEndpointConversionContext.GetOperationDescription%2A> method returns the operation for the specified operation binding.
Gets the <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Description.WsdlContractConversionContext"></xref> being exported or imported.
Use the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.WsdlEndpointConversionContext.ContractConversionContext%2A> to obtain the conversion context of the contract for the endpoint.
The <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Description.WsdlContractConversionContext"></xref> being exported or imported.
Gets the <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Description.ServiceEndpoint"></xref> being exported or imported.
Use the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.WsdlEndpointConversionContext.Endpoint%2A> property to obtain the service endpoint description on export or import.
The <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Description.ServiceEndpoint"></xref> being exported or imported.
Gets the WSDL binding associated with the fault.
This method is the inverse of the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.WsdlEndpointConversionContext.GetFaultDescription%2A> method.
The <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Description.FaultDescription"></xref> for the fault associated with the WSDL binding.
The WSDL <xref href="System.Web.Services.Description.FaultBinding"></xref> associated with the fault.
Gets the description for the fault associated with the WSDL fault binding.
This method is the inverse of the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.WsdlEndpointConversionContext.GetFaultBinding%2A> method.
The <xref href="System.Web.Services.Description.FaultBinding"></xref> associated with the WSDL fault binding.
The <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Description.FaultDescription"></xref> for the fault associated with the WSDL binding.
Gets the WSDL binding for the message specified by the description.
This method is the inverse of the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.WsdlEndpointConversionContext.GetMessageDescription%2A> method.
The <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Description.MessageDescription"></xref> associated with the description.
The <xref href="System.Web.Services.Description.MessageBinding"></xref> for the message specified by the description.
Gets the message description for the message specified by the WSDL binding.
This method is the inverse of the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.WsdlEndpointConversionContext.GetMessageBinding%2A> method.
The <xref href="System.Web.Services.Description.MessageBinding"></xref> associated with the message.
The <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Description.MessageDescription"></xref> for the message specified by the binding.
Gets the WSDL binding for the operation specified by the description.
This method is the inverse of the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.WsdlEndpointConversionContext.GetOperationDescription%2A> method.
The <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Description.OperationDescription"></xref> of the operation associated with the binding.
The <xref href="System.Web.Services.Description.OperationBinding"></xref> for the operation specified by the description.
Returns the operation description of the operation associated with the WSDL binding.
This method is the inverse of the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.WsdlEndpointConversionContext.GetOperationBinding%2A> method.
The <xref href="System.Web.Services.Description.OperationBinding"></xref> associated with the description.
The <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Description.OperationDescription"></xref> of the operation associated with the binding.
Gets the <xref href="System.Web.Services.Description.Binding"></xref> for the WSDL endpoint.
The <xref href="System.Web.Services.Description.Binding"></xref> for the WSDL endpoint.
Gets the <xref href="System.Web.Services.Description.Port"></xref> for the WSDL endpoint.
The <xref href="System.Web.Services.Description.Port"></xref> for the WSDL endpoint.
